newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy changes 97 deficit/gdp ratio to 3 pct.
newsitem.headline: Italy changes 97 deficit/gdp ratio to 3 pct.

text.p: Italy will change its official 1997 deficit/gdp ratio to three percent from 4.5 percent, an Italian government official said.
The official said Italy's three-year rolling economic strategy would be amended accordingly and the European Commission would be informed of the change.
